query.name: com.stevenriehl.student_globalid_update.pq.oidc_student_update
query.description: Students that need to have their OIDC updated to their new email address
query.sql:
with studentemail as ( select ssm.studentsdcid, psc.email from psm_studentcontact psc inner join sync_studentmap ssm on psc.studentid = ssm.studentid inner join psm_studentcontacttype psct on psc.studentcontacttypeid = psct.id and psct.name = 'Self' and psc.email is not null )
select distinct students.dcid "Student DCID" , 'STUDENT' "SSO User Type" , case when students.enroll_status = 0 then coalesce(studentemail.email, '#delete') else '#delete' end "Global Identifier" from students left join accessstudent on accessstudent.studentsdcid = students.dcid left join pcas_externalaccountmap on pcas_externalaccountmap.pcas_accounttoken = accessstudent.accountidentifier left join (select * from studentemail) studentemail on studentemail.studentsdcid = students.dcid where ( pcas_externalaccountmap.openiduseraccountid is not null and students.enroll_status != 0 ) or ( students.enroll_status = 0 and pcas_externalaccountmap.openiduseraccountid is null and studentemail.email is not null ) or ( students.enroll_status = 0 and pcas_externalaccountmap.openiduseraccountid != studentemail.email )
